marklogic.body:
THEY WEREN'T WORTHY OF THEIR GUEST....
It's sad when politicians feel they need to pay lip service to this herd of cackling hen's. I am so sick of this asinine program and will never support any commercial (in lieu of using the word that Burns their flesh , 'capitalistic') endeavors any of them involve themselves in. Especially the legally dead Barbra Walters. Whoopi's last book was a big flop and she can chalk that up to her 'Bride of Obama' status, her filthy racist mouth and for not changing her hideous hair do for 20 years. It must be alive and crawling. This house of hacks serves only to diseminate far left c r a p for our first fake King and the First Bovine.
Barbara Walters is at least 3,000 years old....why do old crusty, sickening liberals hang on to heir careers even after they Reach the point that their makeup call is at midnight to face the camera at 4 p.m. This woman is a cadaver!
